      • fadeZNear

        public float fadeZNear()

        A specification of the distance at which to begin fading in instances. This allows instances to quickly fade out when they get too close to the view plane.

        Specified by:
        fadeZNear in interface R2TranslucentShaderBasicParametersType
        Returns:
        The positive eye-space Z distance at which to start fading in instances
        See Also:
        fadeZFar()
